document_data.name: Ring of Hardened Magma
document_data.mainbody: The '''''ring of hardened magma''''' was a [[relic]] sacred to the [[Black Raven tribe]] of [[Uthgardt]] . It was located within their [[ancestral mound]] of [[Raven Rock]], in the [[Spine of the World]] mountains.
document_data.Description:
As its name states, the ring was formed of magma that had hardened in a circular form. It was sized to fit the finger of a [[giant]].

If an individual [[Attunement|attuned]] to it, the ring shone with orange radiance and, if necessary, changed its size to fit their hand.
document_data.Powers: The ''ring of hardened magma'' possessed six charges. Once per day, the wielder could expend a charge to cast the [[spell]] ''[[conjure minor elementals]]'' or the ''warm'' version of ''[[fire shield]]''.
